title: Get TTO video linking requests as a brand

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: campaign_ids
parameters.description: The IDs of existing TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns to filter the results by. To obtain a list of TTO Creator Marketplace campaigns, use /tto/tcm/campaign/ . Max size: 50.

parameters.name: handle_names
parameters.description: The creator handle names to filter the results by. Max size: 50.

parameters.name: campaign_type
parameters.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link . If this field is not specified, all campaigns will be returned.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number. Value range: â‰¥ 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Value range: 1-50. Default value: 10.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: video_infos
fields.description: Information about the linking requests for videos.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of a creator's public video to be linked to the campaign.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the request. Enum values: IN_REVIEW : Sent to the creator and pending the creator's acceptance or rejection. APPROVE : Approved by the creator. REJECTED : Rejected by the creator. REVOKE : Revoked.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign.

fields.name: last_reminded_timestamp
fields.description: The last time when the linking request or the reminder notification was sent to the creator, in ISO-8601 format. Example: 2025-01-01T00:00:01Z .

fields.name: number_of_requests
fields.description: The number of requests for linking the video ( video_id ) to the campaign ( campaign_id ) that you have sent to the creator. Example: 1.

fields.name: campaign_type
fields.description: The type of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign. Enum values: CAMPAIGN : A campaign with a campaign-level invite link . BRAND_LINK : A campaign with a brand-level invite link .

fields.name: link_request_id
fields.description: ID of the linking request. You can share the ID with the invited creator so that the creator can use /tto/creator/link/request/confirm/ to approve or reject the linking request.
